DOC.brief_summary: This study was designed to examine if provoking thoughts of mortality among medical students can influence cardiac risk assessments depending on the religion of the target patient.
DOC.brief_title: The Psychosocial Effect of Thoughts of Personal Mortality on Cardiac Risk Assessment by Medical Students
DOC.detailed_description: This study was designed to examine whether and how provoking thoughts of mortality among medical students can influence cardiac risk assessments depending on the religion of the target patient.
